item.title: Anti-Money Laundering Concepts: AML, KYC and Compliance
item.description: Welcome to the course on Anti-Money Laundering (AML), where you will learn about the key issues faced by financial institutions today: Money Laundering and Terrorist Financing. This course will educate you on Money Laundering and Terrorist Financing laws, Know Your Customer, Customer Due Diligence, Economic Sanctions and Politically Exposed Persons. This is a comprehensive course that captures all relevant concepts required for training employees of an organization. We will start the course by understanding the term Money Laundering and will then cover the process & impact of the same.
